summary: Millennials, or Gen Y, are people born between 1981 and 1996. They are the first generation to grow up with the internet, earning them the nickname "digital natives." This generation is known for their comfort with technology and online communication. Millennials have faced economic challenges, including high unemployment and student debt, leading some to call them the "Unluckiest Generation." They tend to delay marriage and have fewer children, contributing to declining fertility rates. Millennials are also less religious than previous generations.
title: Millennials
